items.sentence: Have you ever had to fire someone that you didn't think deserved to be fired?
Have you ever considered how hard life would be like without Tom to help you?
Someone named Tom stopped by this afternoon and gave me this package for you.
You don't have many options, so you're not really in a position to be choosy.
It may be uncouth, but I love to eat peanut butter out of a jar with a spoon.
